lead_paragraph: Charles Barkley is headed back to the tables in Las Vegas to play in a poker tournament about a month after pledging not to gamble. He says it is for charity. Barkley is set to play in a celebrity tournament at the 2008 World Series of Poker on July 2. The “Ante Up for Africa” event is designed to raise money and awareness for the crisis in Darfur.
